patterns_discovered: Mock Supabase client with RLS simulation
Comprehensive RLS filtering across multiple database tables
Simulated authentication and organization-based data access control
gotchas_discovered: Complex RLS filtering requires detailed simulation of database permissions
Need to handle special cases like price ledger filtering
Must prevent cross-tenant data access at every database table level
recommendations: Maintain comprehensive RLS testing for all multi-tenant data access points
Continuously update mock RLS simulation to match real database policies
Implement similar isolation tests for new database tables or entities
Consider parameterizing tests for easier maintenance and scalability
